ModMetaData.name: Rimtroid: Evolution (early preview)
ModMetaData.author: Drazzii
ModMetaData.description:
Adds the iconic Metroid species from the "Metroid" game series, alongisde all it's stages.
This particular mod focuses on the 'true' Metroids of the canon, from the Metroid egg all the way up to the Metroid Queen. As this is an early preview, not everything is completely balanced, and issues might occur.


Credits: 
 - Based on the "Metroid" and "Metroid Prime" game series, created by Nintendo.
